entry.title: Awesome Marketing Updates on Apr 07 - Apr 13, 2025
entry.content:
SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / SEO Analytics

  • OnRanko - Review Harness AI-driven agents to supercharge your SEO, boost rankings, and maximize visibility.

Social Media Marketing / Social Media Management

  • ReplyZen - Review - AI tool that automates social media comment management for Facebook and Instagram, auto replying and moderating comments.

entry.title: Awesome Marketing Updates on Nov 25 - Dec 01, 2024
entry.content:
Marketing Strategy and Planning / Market Segmentation and Targeting

  • Segment - Review - Customer data platform that simplifies data collection and usage across platforms.
  • HubSpot Persona Builder - Review - Free tool for creating detailed buyer personas.
  • Xtensio - Review - Visual collaboration platform for creating and sharing living documents.
  • Claritas - Review - Provides audience segmentation and insights to target consumers more accurately.

Marketing Automation / Marketing Workflow Automation

  • CoSchedule - Review - Marketing calendar and project management software for organizing marketing activities.
  • Zapier - Review - Automation tool that connects your apps and automates repetitive tasks.
  • Integromat - Review - Automation platform that allows you to connect apps and automate workflows.
  • Automate.io - Review - Simple tool for automating repetitive tasks and connecting apps.

Marketing Strategy and Planning / Campaign Planning

  • Trello - Review - Simple, visual tool for managing projects and tasks with boards, lists, and cards.
  • Asana - Review - Project management platform that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives.
  • Monday.com - Review - Work operating system to manage any team and any project with customizable workflows.
  • Wrike - Review - Cloud-based collaboration and project management software.

Marketing Strategy and Planning / Budgeting and Forecasting

  • PlanGuru - Review - Budgeting, forecasting, and financial performance review software.
  • Allocadia - Review - Marketing performance management software that helps with budgeting and planning.
  • Adaptive Insights - Review - Financial planning and analysis software to improve business agility.
  • Float - Review - Cash flow forecasting software for managing budgets and financials.
  • HubSpot Forecasting Tool - Review - Free tool to help predict future sales and revenue.

Marketing Strategy and Planning / Competitor and Market Analysis

  • Statista - Review - Online statistics, market research, and business intelligence portal.
  • IBISWorld - Review - Industry market research reports and data for strategic planning.

Market Research and Competitor Analysis / Competitor Analysis

  • Crayon - Review - Competitive intelligence platform that tracks your competitors' digital footprints to uncover strategic insights.
  • SimilarWeb - Review - Website analytics and competitive analysis platform that provides insights on traffic sources, engagement, and audience demographics.
  • Owler - Review - Business insights platform that provides real-time news, alerts, and analysis on competitors and industry trends.
  • SpyFu - Review - Competitor research tool that reveals the keywords websites are buying on Google Ads and the keywords they're ranking for in organic search.
  • Kompyte - Review - Competitor tracking software that monitors competitor websites, social media, and online ads in real-time.

Marketing Strategy and Planning / Marketing Mix Modeling

  • MixMod - Review - Statistical software for clustering, classification, and discriminant analysis.
  • SAS Marketing Mix - Review - Analyzes historical data to evaluate marketing impact and ROI.
  • Nielsen Marketing Cloud - Review - Tools for optimizing marketing strategies using comprehensive data analytics.
  • BrandMaker - Review - Marketing resource management solution that helps optimize the marketing mix.
  • MarketShare - Review - Advanced analytics for evaluating marketing impact and making strategic decisions.

SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / Link Building

  • Ahrefs - Review - Toolset for backlink analysis, competitor research, and link-building strategies.
  • BuzzStream - Review - Outreach platform that helps with link building and managing relationships with influencers.
  • Pitchbox - Review - Outreach and link building software that automates the process of connecting with influencers.
  • Majestic - Review - Backlink analysis tool that provides comprehensive link intelligence data.
  • Moz Link Explorer - Review - Tool for analyzing backlinks, finding link-building opportunities, and tracking your site's link profile.

Search Engine Marketing (SEM) / PPC Management

  • SEMrush - Review - All-in-one marketing toolkit with PPC management features, including keyword research and competitive analysis.
  • Google Ads - Review - Online advertising platform for creating ads that appear on Google Search, YouTube, and other Google properties.
  • Bing Ads - Review - Paid search advertising on the Bing search engine, offering similar features to Google Ads.
  • WordStream - Review - PPC software for managing and optimizing Google Ads and Bing Ads campaigns.
  • Marin Software - Review - Cross-channel advertising platform for managing SEM campaigns across search, social, and display.

SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / Keyword Research

  • Moz - Review - SEO software offering keyword research, link building, and site audits.
  • Ubersuggest - Review - Free tool for generating new keyword ideas and analyzing SEO metrics.
  • KeywordTool.io - Review - Tool for finding long-tail keywords for SEO, PPC, and content creation.

SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / On-Page SEO

  • Yoast SEO - Review - WordPress plugin for optimizing on-page SEO elements.
  • SurferSEO - Review - On-page SEO tool for optimizing content based on top-performing pages.
  • Clearscope - Review - Content optimization platform that helps improve content relevance and SEO.
  • MarketMuse - Review - AI-driven platform for content research and on-page SEO optimization.
  • Rank Math - Review - SEO plugin for WordPress that offers SEO suggestions while you write.

SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / Technical SEO

  • Screaming Frog - Review - Website crawler that helps improve onsite SEO by analyzing website elements.
  • DeepCrawl - Review - Cloud-based SEO tool for website audits and technical SEO analysis.
  • Google PageSpeed Insights - Review - Tool that analyzes a page‚Äôs content and provides suggestions for speeding up your site.
  • GTmetrix - Review - Performance analysis tool that provides insights into how well your site loads and helps identify where improvements can be made.
  • Sitebulb - Review - Desktop-based website audit tool for technical SEO with visual representations.

SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / Local SEO

  • Yext - Review - Manages business listings and information across multiple directories to improve local SEO.
  • BrightLocal - Review - Local SEO platform for improving local search visibility and managing citations.
  • Moz Local - Review - Tool to manage and improve your local business listings across the web.
  • Whitespark - Review - Tools and services to help businesses rank better in local search results.
  • Synup - Review - Comprehensive local marketing platform for managing business listings, reviews, and SEO.

SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / SERP Tracking

  • SE Ranking - Review - All-in-one SEO software that includes SERP tracking and competitor analysis.
  • AccuRanker - Review - Fast and accurate SERP rank tracking tool for SEO professionals.
  • Ahrefs - Review - Tracks your website‚Äôs keyword rankings and monitors how they change over time.
  • SEMrush Position Tracking - Review - Tracks daily changes in rankings for any domain across multiple devices.
  • SERPWatcher - Review - Rank tracking tool designed to monitor SEO progress and performance.

SEO (Search Engine Optimization) / SEO Analytics

  • Google Search Console - Review - Free tool by Google that helps monitor and maintain your site's presence in Google Search results.
  • SEMrush - Review - Comprehensive SEO analytics tool for tracking performance and analyzing competitors.
  • Ahrefs - Review - Analytics toolset that provides insights into website performance, traffic, and keyword rankings.

Social Media Marketing / Social Media Management

  • Hootsuite - Review - Platform to manage social media profiles, schedule posts, and track engagement across multiple networks.
  • Buffer - Review - Social media management tool for scheduling posts and analyzing performance across multiple accounts.
  • Sprout Social - Review - Social media management solution with powerful analytics, engagement, and scheduling tools.
  • Later - Review - Visual content calendar for planning and scheduling Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest posts.
  • SocialBee - Review - Social media management platform that allows for content scheduling, recycling, and curation.

Social Media Marketing / Social Media Advertising

  • Facebook Ads Manager - Review - Tool for creating, managing, and analyzing ads on Facebook and Instagram.
  • AdEspresso - Review - Tool to create, manage, and optimize Facebook and Instagram ad campaigns.

Content Marketing / Content Creation

  • Canva - Review - Design tool for creating professional graphics, presentations, social media posts, and more.
  • Animoto - Review - Video creation platform that enables you to produce professional-quality videos with ease.
  • Piktochart - Review - Infographic maker and presentation tool to create visually appealing content.
  • Adobe Spark - Review - Suite of design apps for creating social graphics, web pages, and videos.

Search Engine Marketing (SEM) / Retargeting

  • AdRoll - Review - Retargeting platform that helps marketers reach customers who have previously interacted with their brand across multiple devices.
  • Criteo - Review - Global retargeting and display advertising platform that personalizes ads for each user.
  • Facebook Ads Retargeting - Review - Retargeting ads on Facebook and Instagram, targeting users who have engaged with your content.
  • Perfect Audience - Review - Retargeting platform for managing display, social, and mobile retargeting campaigns.
  • Google Ads Remarketing - Review - Remarketing tool that helps advertisers re-engage previous visitors with targeted ads across the web.

Content Marketing / Content Curation

  • BuzzSumo - Review - Tool to find the most shared content and trending topics in any niche.
  • Feedly - Review - Content aggregator and RSS reader for organizing and reading content from your favorite sources.
  • Scoop.it - Review - Content curation tool for discovering and sharing engaging content.
  • Pocket - Review - Save articles, videos, and web pages to view later offline on any device.
  • Curata - Review - Content curation software for discovering, organizing, and sharing high-quality content.

Social Media Marketing / Influencer Marketing

  • Upfluence - Review - Influencer marketing platform for discovering and managing influencer campaigns.
  • AspireIQ - Review - Influencer marketing software to help brands connect with creators.
  • Traackr - Review - Data-driven influencer marketing platform for building relationships and managing campaigns.
  • Grin - Review - Influencer marketing software that helps brands manage influencer relationships at scale.

Content Marketing / Content Management Systems (CMS)

  • BCMS - BCMS is an API-based Headless CMS, that provides flexible content modeling for creative projects in Next.js, Astro, Nuxt.js, and more

Content Marketing / Copywriting Tools

  • Jasper - Review - AI-powered copywriting tool for generating marketing copy, blog posts, and more.
  • Copy.ai - Review - AI writing assistant that helps generate creative and engaging copy for various purposes.
  • Grammarly - Review - Writing assistant that improves grammar, punctuation, clarity, and style.
  • Hemingway - Review - App that makes your writing concise and clear by highlighting complex sentences.
  • Writesonic - Review - AI writer and copywriting tool that creates high-converting copy for ads, blogs, and more.
  • LogicBalls - Review - An AI-powered writing tool to create any type of content and supercharge your productivity

Customer Relationship Management (CRM) / Email CRM Integration

  • Mailchimp - Review - Marketing automation platform that offers CRM features and seamless email marketing integration.
  • ActiveCampaign - Review - CRM and email marketing platform that focuses on customer experience automation.
  • HubSpot - Review - All-in-one CRM platform with integrated email marketing and automation features.
  • Salesforce Email Studio - Review - Powerful email marketing solution within Salesforce‚Äôs CRM platform.
  • Constant Contact - Review - Email marketing platform with CRM functionalities designed for small businesses.

Email Marketing / Email Campaigns

  • ConvertKit - Review - Email marketing software designed for creators, bloggers, and online businesses with powerful automation features.
  • GetResponse - Review - Email marketing software with powerful automation features, landing pages, and webinars.
  • AWeber - Review - Email marketing platform offering autoresponders, landing pages, and email automation.

Email Marketing / Email Automation

  • Klaviyo - Review - Email and SMS marketing automation platform tailored for eCommerce businesses.
  • SendinBlue - Review - Email marketing and automation software that includes SMS marketing and chat features.
  • Touchlead - Review - Marketing software with workflow automation, supporting email campaigns, social media scheduling and more.
  • Autopilot - Review - Visual marketing automation software for creating personalized customer journeys.
  • Drip - Review - ECRM platform designed for building personalized email campaigns to engage customers.

Email Marketing / Email Analytics

  • Litmus - Review - Email testing, analysis, and optimization platform that helps you create error-free emails.
  • Mailjet - Review - Email marketing software with A/B testing, segmentation, and real-time analytics.
  • Google Analytics for Email - Review - Tool to track email marketing campaigns using Google Analytics.
  • Campaign Monitor - Review - Email marketing platform with powerful analytics and segmentation tools.

Email Marketing / Email Design

  • Stripo - Review - Email template builder with drag-and-drop functionality and ready-to-use designs.
  • BeeFree - Review - Free online email editor to design responsive emails quickly.
  • Litmus Builder - Review - Tool for designing, building, and testing emails in one place.
  • Postcards by Designmodo - Review - Easy-to-use email design tool for creating responsive email templates.
  • Chamaileon - Review - Collaborative email design platform for creating custom email templates.

Email Marketing / Email Deliverability

  • Heybounce - Review - Email verification service that checks if an email exists and detects disposable emails to reduce bounce rates.
  • GlockApps - Review - Tool to diagnose email deliverability problems.
  • Mailtrap - Review - Platform used to test deliverability before sending and control results in one place.

Marketing Automation / Lead Nurturing

  • Marketo - Review - Marketing automation software that offers lead management, email marketing, and analytics.
  • Pardot - Review - B2B marketing automation by Salesforce for managing email campaigns, nurturing leads, and more.
  • Infusionsoft - Review - All-in-one sales and marketing automation software for small businesses.

Marketing Automation / Customer Journey Mapping

  • Lucidchart - Review - Diagramming application that helps you visualize complex processes, including customer journeys.
  • Smaply - Review - Tool for mapping customer journeys, personas, and stakeholder maps.
  • Gliffy - Review - Easy-to-use diagramming tool for creating flowcharts, diagrams, and more.

Advertising and Media Buying / Programmatic Advertising

  • The Trade Desk - Review - Demand-side platform (DSP) that allows advertisers to buy digital ads programmatically across various channels.
  • MediaMath - Review - DSP platform for managing, optimizing, and analyzing digital ad campaigns in real-time.
  • Amazon Advertising - Review - Advertising platform that allows brands to run targeted ads on Amazon's properties.
  • Google Marketing Platform - Review - Unified advertising and analytics platform for smarter marketing and better results.
  • AppNexus - Review - Programmatic advertising platform that helps advertisers and publishers maximize ad revenue.

Search Engine Marketing (SEM) / Display Advertising

  • Google Display Network - Review - Display advertising network allowing advertisers to place ads on millions of websites and apps.
  • AdThrive - Review - Ad management service for publishers, focusing on maximizing revenue through high-quality ads.

Advertising and Media Buying / Native Advertising

  • Outbrain - Review - Native advertising platform that promotes content through content recommendations on premium publisher sites.
  • Taboola - Review - Leading native advertising platform that delivers personalized content recommendations.
  • Nativo - Review - Platform for creating, distributing, and optimizing native ads across multiple channels.
  • TripleLift - Review - Native advertising platform that seamlessly integrates ads into content environments.
  • AdYouLike - Review - Native advertising solution that delivers in-feed ads that match the look and feel of editorial content.

Analytics and Reporting / Web Analytics

  • Google Analytics - Review - Comprehensive web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic and user behavior.
  • Adobe Analytics - Review - Advanced analytics solution for data-driven insights across all marketing channels.
  • Hotjar - Review - Behavior analytics and user feedback service that helps you understand how users interact with your site.
  • Piwik PRO - Review - Privacy-focused analytics suite that offers detailed insights into website visitors' behavior.

Analytics and Reporting / Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)

  • Crazy Egg - Review - Visual analytics and testing platform that includes heatmaps, click maps, and user recordings.
  • Optimizely - Review - A/B testing and experimentation platform for optimizing digital experiences across websites and apps.
  • VWO - Review - Conversion optimization platform that provides A/B testing, split URL testing, and multivariate testing.
  • Unbounce - Review - Landing page builder with A/B testing features to help improve conversion rates.
  • Google Optimize - Review - Free A/B testing and personalization tool by Google that integrates with Google Analytics.

Analytics and Reporting / Dashboards and Reporting

  • Tableau - Review - Powerful data visualization software that helps create interactive and shareable dashboards.
  • Google Data Studio - Review - Free data visualization tool that turns data into informative and customizable dashboards and reports.
  • Klipfolio - Review - Dashboard and reporting software that allows you to connect, visualize, and share your data.
  • Supermetrics - Review - Data integration tool that pulls data from various marketing platforms into spreadsheets, dashboards, and data warehouses.
  • Power BI - Review - Business analytics service by Microsoft that provides interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities.

Customer Relationship Management (CRM) / CRM Software

  • Salesforce - Review - Leading CRM platform offering a wide range of tools for sales, marketing, and customer service automation.
  • HubSpot CRM - Review - Free CRM platform that integrates with HubSpot‚Äôs marketing, sales, and service tools.
  • Zoho CRM - Review - Comprehensive CRM software with a wide array of features for sales automation, analytics, and customer support.
  • Pipedrive - Review - Sales-focused CRM tool designed to help sales teams manage leads and deals effectively.
  • Microsoft Dynamics 365 - Review - CRM and ERP applications that integrate data, business logic, and processes.

Customer Relationship Management (CRM) / Customer Support

  • Zendesk - Review - Customer service software that helps companies provide seamless support across channels.
  • Freshdesk - Review - Cloud-based customer support software that offers help desk, ticketing, and knowledge management solutions.
  • Intercom - Review - Conversational relationship platform that enables businesses to communicate with customers via messaging, bots, and automation.
  • Drift - Review - Conversational marketing platform that combines chat, email, and automation to improve customer engagement.
  • Help Scout - Review - Customer service platform designed to help small businesses manage email, live chat, and knowledge base interactions.
  • NeetoDesk - Review - A price-competitive customer service software to help companies provide support using email.

Advertising and Media Buying / Affiliate Marketing

  • CJ Affiliate - Review - One of the largest affiliate marketing networks, connecting advertisers with a vast network of publishers.
  • ShareASale - Review - Affiliate marketing network offering a wide range of products for publishers to promote.
  • Refersion - Review - Affiliate and influencer marketing platform that tracks and manages partner programs.
  • Tapfiliate - Review - Cloud-based affiliate marketing software for managing and tracking affiliate relationships.
  • Rakuten Advertising - Review - Global affiliate marketing network offering tools for managing and optimizing affiliate programs.

Market Research and Competitor Analysis / Market Research Tools

  • SurveyMonkey - Review - Leading online survey platform for creating, distributing, and analyzing surveys.
  • Typeform - Review - User-friendly survey and form-building tool known for its conversational and interactive interface.
  • Toluna - Review - Real-time digital consumer insights platform for conducting surveys and gathering consumer feedback.
  • Qualtrics - Review - Experience management platform that helps organizations manage customer, employee, product, and brand experiences.
  • Google Surveys - Review - Simple, fast survey platform by Google that provides quick insights through online surveys.

Brand Management / Reputation Management

  • Brand24 - Review - Online reputation management tool that monitors your brand's mentions across social media, blogs, and forums.
  • Reputology - Review - Review monitoring and management platform designed to help businesses track and respond to online reviews.
  • Trustpilot - Review - Consumer review website that allows businesses to build and manage their online reputation through customer reviews.
  • Podium - Review - Interaction management platform that helps businesses manage customer reviews, messaging, and payments.
  • Yotpo - Review - Customer content marketing platform that helps brands leverage reviews, photos, and Q&A to build trust and drive sales.

Brand Management / Brand Monitoring

  • Mention - Review - Real-time media monitoring tool that allows businesses to track mentions of their brand across the web and social media.
  • Talkwalker - Review - Social listening and analytics platform that monitors brand mentions across social, print, broadcast, and online channels.
  • Brandwatch - Review - Digital consumer intelligence and social media listening platform for tracking and analyzing online conversations about your brand.
  • Meltwater - Review - Media intelligence platform that provides media monitoring, social listening, and analytics to help brands manage their reputation.
  • Sprinklr - Review - Unified customer experience management platform that includes social listening, engagement, and analytics tools.

Brand Management / Digital Asset Management (DAM)

  • Bynder - Review - Digital asset management platform that helps brands create, manage, and distribute digital content efficiently.
  • Widen - Review - DAM platform that enables brands to organize, manage, and share their digital assets in a centralized location.
  • Canto - Review - User-friendly digital asset management solution for organizing and sharing visual content.
  • Brandfolder - Review - DAM software that offers a centralized location for managing and sharing brand assets securely.
  • Adobe Experience Manager - Review - Enterprise-level DAM solution that integrates with Adobe's Creative Cloud for seamless asset management and content creation.

entry.title: Awesome Marketing Updates on Aug 26 - Sep 01, 2024
entry.content:
Content Marketing / Content Management Systems (CMS)

  • WordPress - The world‚Äôs most popular CMS, offering extensive plugins and themes for customization.
  • Drupal - Open-source CMS known for its robust security and scalability.
  • Joomla - Flexible and easy-to-use CMS, ideal for building websites and online applications.
  • HubSpot CMS - CMS that integrates seamlessly with HubSpot‚Äôs CRM and marketing tools.
  • Squarespace - All-in-one website builder offering beautifully designed templates and an easy-to-use interface.

Marketing Automation / Customer Journey Mapping

  • [Creately](https://creately
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Aug 26 - Sep 01, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Marketing Updates on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
entry.content:
Books / Digital Asset Management (DAM)

  • "This Is Marketing: You Can't Be Seen Until You Learn to See" by Seth Godin - Seth Godin argues that marketing isn't about the stuff you make but the stories you tell.
  • "Contagious: How to Build Word of Mouth in the Digital Age" by Jonah Berger - Explains why certain things catch on, and how you can use these ideas to craft contagious content.

Blogs / Digital Asset Management (DAM)

  • HubSpot Blog - Offers information on inbound marketing, sales, and customer service strategies. Visit Blog
  • Neil Patel's Blog - Covers a range of digital marketing topics with actionable tips and guides. Visit Blog

Podcasts / Digital Asset Management (DAM)

  • Marketing Over Coffee - A weekly discussion of what's new in marketing. Listen Here
  • The GaryVee Audio Experience - Covers marketing, social media, entrepreneurship by Gary Vaynerchuk. Listen Here

Online Resources and Courses / Digital Asset Management (DAM)

  • Coursera Marketing Courses - Offers courses on digital marketing, social media marketing, and more from top universities. Visit Coursera
  • Google Digital Garage - Free online courses from Google on digital marketing, data and tech. Visit Google Digital Garage
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
